instructions: Execute both context gathering and strategy decision steps in sequence.

**Summary:** Identify which scenarios to walkthrough, areas of risk/uncertainty, and desired depth. Present questions in chat, get user responses, store clarification data to project area docs/context/walkthrough-clarification.json.

**Summary:** Present walkthrough depth options and any other strategic decisions. Ask user to review and select preferred options. Store strategy data to project area docs/context/walkthrough-strategy.json.
- Walkthrough purpose (business complexity, architecture complexity, integration complexity, new frameworks, or mixed)
- Walkthrough depth (high-level, story-level, detailed, or mixed)
- Which scenarios to prioritize (risk, uncertainty, integration, complexity)
- Stopping criteria (when to stop tracing redundant flows)
1. Execute STEP 1 (required context) - wait for completion
2. Execute STEP 2 (strategy decisions) - wait for completion
3. Proceed to build action to create walkthrough realizations
